Lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[ti:Lift Me Up (FlyBoy Remix)]
[ar:FlyBoy Mree =35955099]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:01.18]You come around and wipe my tears away
[00:06.39]You make me wanna give my heart away
[00:19.00]
[00:47.48]The way you speak, it leaves me without words
[00:54.76]And when you're gone it makes me toss and turn
[01:02.55]You come around and make sure that it hurts
[01:08.57]You make sure that it hurts when you're away
[01:15.44]
[02:04.65]Here among the clouds
[02:12.38]We are safe and sound
[02:18.70]You lift me up
[02:26.54]You lift me up
[02:50.58]You lift me up
[02:58.27]You lift me up
[03:06.87]
